FuncDef: The reset acl ipv6 counter command clears statistics about a specified or all ACL6s. The reset acl ipv6 counter command clears statistics about a specified or all ACL6s.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the number of an ACL6.
The number of a basic ACL6 ranges from 2000 to 2999.

Specifies the number of an ACL6.
The number of an advanced ACL6 ranges from 3000 to 3999.

Specifies the name of an ACL6.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo: To clear statistics about a specified or all ACL6s, run the reset acl ipv6 counter command. Before collecting ACL6 statistics in a specified period, run this command to clear the original statistics.
